name: Chest
description: The chest muscle group, involved in bench presses and push-ups.

name: Back
description: The dorsal muscle group, responsible for pull-ups, rows, and trunk stabilization.

name: Shoulders
description: The deltoid group, involved in front raises, lateral raises, and overhead presses.

name: Biceps
description: The front arm muscle, important for elbow flexion and rowing.

name: Triceps
description: The back arm muscle, used in elbow extension and pressing movements.

name: Abs
description: The core muscles of the trunk, essential for stability and balance.

name: Legs
description: The thigh and calf group, involved in squats, lunges, and leg presses.

name: Glutes
description: The gluteal muscles, important for hip extension and pelvis stability.
